video_title: Don't wait for the 'perfect moment' to wear the hijab because guidance isn't delayed, it's accepted. The shaytaan will always whisper reasons to postpone, but your soul is longing for closeness to Allar now. Every step toward modesty is a step toward Jannah. Start with sincerity, even if it's hard. Allah sees the struggle, and He never lets it go unrewarded. ğŸŒŸğŸ¤²ğŸ”
